name: Pure Space
description:
Made for 7DRL.

You play as a mage attempting to gain control over the material plane by ascending through the planes of pure space.

Key features:

  • Fluid terrain, tiles can drift around the map at the whim of enemies.
  • Time is your health, every turn wasted brings you closer to death.
  • Unique and interesting enemies, each enemy has its own special ability ranging from teleporting dodges to morphing the terrain.
